programme.title: Montgomery bus boycott
programme.short_synopsis: Recollections of the Montgomery bus boycott prompted by Rosa Parks in 1955.
programme.medium_synopsis: During the week of Martin Luther King's birthday holiday, Cooke remembers his 1956 visit to meet with people from both sides of the Montgomery bus boycott prompted by Rosa Parks.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
